thread.title: Cameron and Cindy Mott
thread.title_full: 4seating.com reviewed by Cameron and Cindy Mott

author: Cameron and Cindy Mott
title: Cameron and Cindy Mott
text:
I called in to cancel my order due to shipping delays and order mishaps and Anna fortunately answered the call. She listened to me vent and asked if she could place me on hold to see what she could do. Of course I was already skeptical but figured what could another 5-10 minutes of waiting hurt. Not only was she able to resolve all of my problems with her superior product knowledge (had the missing parts of my seating created by switching arms) but she got that done in one day and shipped the next! I can't thank her enough and wish I would have spoke with her the first 3 times I had called in. She is amazing!
Thanks again Anna!
Cameron Mott
